title: Yelp Scraper
description: Provide either search terms or direct URLs.

searchTerms.title: Search terms
searchTerms.description:
Here you can provide a search queries for Yelp bussinesses to scrape.

Choose either of 'Search Terms' or 'Direct URLs'.

locations.title: Locations
locations.description: Locations that will be searched for each search term.

searchLimit.title: Search results limit
searchLimit.description: How many search results (eq. Yelp bussinesses) should be processed per search query

directUrls.title: Direct Yelp page URLs instead of search
directUrls.description:
If you already have URL(s) of page(s) you wish to scrape, you can set them here.

Either of 'Search' or 'Direct URLs' or both fields.

maxImages.title: Max images
maxImages.description: Maximum number of images per business
maxImages.sectionDescription: Warning! Reviewer name and Reviewer URL contain personal data. Personal data is protected by GDPR in the European Union and by other regulations around the world. You should not scrape personal data unless you have a legitimate reason to do so. If you're unsure whether your reason is legitimate, consult your lawyers.

reviewLimit.title: Maximum reviews
reviewLimit.description: How many reviews should be scraped per business

proxy.title: Proxy configuration
proxy.description: Proxy is required to run this actor! Either use Apify proxy, or provide your own proxy servers.

maxRequestRetries.title: Max page retries
maxRequestRetries.description: How many times a failed request is retried before thrown away. Requests usually failed when blocked by the target site.
